tool_description: Manages the complete operating system installation process including unattended installation configuration, progress monitoring, and error handling during the installation phase.

installation_media_path.description: Path to bootable installation media or mounted ISO

target_partition.description: Target partition identifier for OS installation

installation_type.description: Installation type: clean_install, upgrade, or repair_install

user_account_name.description: Primary user account name to create

enable_automatic_updates.description: Whether to enable automatic system updates

privacy_settings.description: Privacy settings level: minimal, balanced, or full

error_messages: Installation media not found: Verify the installation media path is correct and accessible.
Invalid target partition: Specified partition does not exist or is not suitable for OS installation.
Unsupported installation type: Use one of [clean_install, upgrade, repair_install].
Invalid user account name: Provide a valid username following OS naming conventions.
Product key validation failed: The provided product key is invalid or not compatible.
Installation process failed: OS installation encountered errors and could not complete.
Invalid timezone: Specify a valid timezone identifier.
Invalid privacy settings: Use one of [minimal, balanced, full].
usage: Provide installation_media_path and target_partition from previous steps. Choose installation_type based on scenario (clean_install for new systems, repair_install for recovery). Set user_account_name and computer_name for system identification.

installation_duration_minutes.description: Total time taken for OS installation in minutes

system_boot_successful.description: Whether the system boots successfully after installation

installed_os_version.description: Version and build number of installed operating system
